title: Sonic Mania

notes: It used to not work saying that the server could not be reached. This happened when using the "Steam (Native)" option on Arch. When I switched to the "Steam (Runtime)" option it worked like a charm. The only complain is that it does not save the option to play fullscreen, I need to set it each time the game starts.
